comments:
3.2 M6
I've been using the refactorings support and was in the middle of applying a big script and an error occured applying the refactoring. So I tried again, and when I try and open the dialog, the following appears in the log:

It's actually blocking me now. Even when I restart this error occurs. Is there some file I could delete which could help?

This is fixed in build > 20060407

As a workaround, you could delete the dialog settings of org.eclipse.ltk.ui.refactoring which stores the script history.
had a close look at the sources since I couldn't reproduce the NPE -> NPE won't occur on update buttons anymore. verified
